summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2018 INFINITI QX60. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 19V807000 (SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC). THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT CALLED INFINITI OF MOBILE (LOCATED AT 1147 E I65 SERVICE RD, MOBILE, AL 36606, 251-732-4849) AND WAS INFORMED THAT THEY WERE ORDERING THE PARTS; HOWEVER, VEHICLES WITH THE ABS WARNING INDICATORS ILLUMINATED WOULD BE REPAIRED FIRST. THE MANUFACTURER WAS INFORMED AND CONFIRMED WHAT WAS TOLD BY THE DEALER. THE CONTACT STATED THAT HE SAW AN UNKNOWN INDICATOR ILLUMINATE INTERMITTENTLY; HOWEVER, HE WAS UNABLE TO VERIFY WHICH INDICATOR. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 1,408.
